title: When is the pbe page going to be FIX!?!?!
body: I singed up for pbe and keep trying to check up on it but the page is always down and i have no clue how long it has been down for just want to know if i got pbe or nah!?!?

replies.body: I was able to access the page without any issue.  Make sure that you're going to the correct page [here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  You may also need to clear your [cache ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)in case something is clogging it, and disable any extensions that could prevent reaching the site.  Hopefully, that helps!
I did all that you said to do and when I click on pbe status it brings me to a page that says error 500  with IBlitzcrank on it. I don't know what to do
